Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, new player here. Tried the demo four days ago, bought the game the day after and now i'm in love with it, can't stop playing.

I hope to find many usefull tips and advices in the forum.

Fly safe !

Hi JackAz, welcome to the community

Tips and advice? Okay here's mine:

Tip, rotate parts with the WASD and QE keys, also hold Shift for 5 degree increments

Advice, hit capslock before you try to land, it activates fine control mode, which makes things a lot easier.

Edited September 10, 2012 by sal_vager
Spelling

Hi JackAz, welcome to the community

Tips and advice? Okay here's mine:

Tip, rotate parts with the WASD and QE keys, also hold Shift for 5 degree increments

Advice, hit capslock before you try to land, it activates fine control mode, which makes thins a lot easier.

Thank you very much, that helped alot . Was just about to land on Mun
Welcome welcome! I think you'll find, as I have, everyone here is great and very helpful! Enjoy the game, it IS very addiction isn't it? Just wait...
